title: Executive Order 5357-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments of the Uncompahgre, Unitah, and White River Bands of Ute Indians, Utah
content: It is hereby ordered, under authority contained in the act of June 21, 1906 (34 Stat. 325-326), that the trust period on the allotments made to members of the Uncompahgre, Uintah, and White River Bands of Ute Indians of Utah, which trust period expires during the calendar year 1930, be, and is hereby, extended for a period of ten years from the date of expiration.
citation: Herbert Hoover, Executive Order 5357-Extension of Trust Period on Allotments of the Uncompahgre, Unitah, and White River Bands of Ute Indians, Utah Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/276894
